snippet: Recreational vehicles might have middle-brow associations in the United States, but in China they are seen as an upholstered magic carpet, toilet included, that provides an escape.
abstract: Recreational vehicles might have middle-brow associations in the United States, but in China they are seen as an upholstered magic carpet, toilet included, that provides an escape.

headline.main: Chinese Embracing the Perceived Freedom of R.V.'s
